name: react-express-template
description: A template for a react/express project

scripts.dist: npm run copyfiles && set NODE_ENV = 'production' && parcel build src/index.html --public-url /app -d dist/static --no-source-maps
scripts.copyfiles: rm -rf dist/* && cp -r package.json src/servers dist
scripts.sass: node-sass res/admin.scss res/admin.css && node-sass res/user.scss res/user.css && node-sass res/landing.scss res/landing.css
scripts.start: pm2 start servers/accounts/accounts.js && pm2 start servers/analytics/analytics.js && pm2 start servers/scans/scans.js
